title: Condition Definition
description: Defines a reusable, named JSON-Logic condition that can be referenced by actions, rules, and operations.

$schema.description: Optional. A URI reference to the schema that this document conforms to.

id.description: Required. Unique, namespaced ID for the condition definition (e.g., 'core:actor-is-not-rooted', 'combat:target-is-vulnerable').

description.description: Required. A human-readable explanation of what this condition checks.

logic.description: Required. The JSON-Logic object that defines the condition's evaluation.
